data.eml:eml: Taxonomic study on new-record genus Bambusana Anufriev (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) in China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dai, Wu, Zhang, Yalin (2006): Taxonomic study on new-record genus Bambusana Anufriev (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) in China. Zootaxa 1187: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.2646123
